PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AirTerminalBoxTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Air terminal box type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: AirflowRateRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Range of airflow that can be delivered.

PropertyDef.Name: AirPressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable air static pressure range at the entrance of the air terminal box.

PropertyDef.Name: ArrangementType
PropertyDef.Definition: Terminal box arrangement.\X\0D SingleDuct: Terminal box receives warm or cold air from a single air supply duct.\X\0D DualDuct: Terminal box receives warm and cold air from separate air supply ducts.

PropertyDef.Name: HasFan
PropertyDef.Definition: Terminal box has a fan inside (fan powered box).

PropertyDef.Name: HasReturnAir
PropertyDef.Definition: Terminal box has return air mixed with supply air from duct work.

PropertyDef.Name: HasSoundAttenuator
PropertyDef.Definition: Terminal box has a sound attenuator.

PropertyDef.Name: HousingThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: Air terminal box housing material thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: OperationTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable operational range of the ambient air temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), provided, if there is no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.

PropertyDef.Name: ReturnAirFractionRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable return air fraction range as a fraction of discharge airflow.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).
